translation.en: I thought they took care of that.
What, student body president isn't enough for you?
translation.es: ¿Qué, ser presidenta estudiantil no te alcanza?

translation.en: - Now you're hall monitor, too, Cassandra? - We're on in a minute, Harry.
translation.es: ¿Ahora eres vigilante, Cassandra?  Salimos en un minuto, Harry.

translation.en: - Hmm. - Eighty- five in a row. Beating the record.
translation.es: - Es un récord, 85 veces seguidas. - Un nuevo récord.

translation.en: A new record. Is that as far as you're prepared to go?
translation.es: - Es un récord, 85 veces seguidas. - Un nuevo récord.  ¿Eso es todo lo que dirás?

translation.en: - You spun them yourself. - Not a flicker of doubt?
translation.es: - Tú misma la hiciste girar. - ¿No dudas ni un poco?

translation.en: I could never ever do that.
Ooh. Re- gifted flowers for the assistant stage manager?
translation.es: ¿Flores regaladas para la ayudante de dirección?

translation.en: The best stage manager in the whole world. - Thank you. -
translation.es: - La mejor ayudante del mundo. - Gracias.

translation.en: You should tell him how you feel.
Okay, but don't be late. Guys?
You need us to bring anything tonight, dude?
Hey, bring some vodka tonight. It's BYOB.
translation.es: Traigan vodka esta noche, cada uno lleva algo.

translation.en: Party at your house, Harry? So nice of you to invite everyone.
translation.es: ¿Hay fiesta en tu casa, Harry? Qué bueno que hayas invitado a todos.

translation.en: Is that really the point, Harry?
It's not for the play. It's for people who are helping out with prom.
translation.es: No es por la obra, es para la gente que ayuda con el baile.

translation.en: But if you want to come...
translation.es: - Pero si quieres venir... - No hay problema.

translation.en: It's okay. I'll see you tomorrow.
translation.es: - Pero si quieres venir... - No hay problema. Hasta mañana.

translation.en: Oh, by the way, Cassandra, you were really, really great tonight.
translation.es: Por cierto, Cassandra, estuviste muy bien esta noche.

translation.en: I'm gonna miss you so much when you go up to Yale.
translation.es: Te extrañaré mucho cuando vayas a Yale.

translation.en: Yeah, you know, on a stage, in an auditorium. For people to come and see.
translation.es: Sí, en un escenario, un auditorio. Algo que la gente va a ver.

translation.en: Did you see this week's check yet?
translation.es: ¿Ya viste el cheque de esta semana?

translation.en: It was supposed to be here today.
Might be a state budget thing, you know.
translation.es: Tal vez sea algo del presupuesto estatal.

translation.en: I'm not the goddamn Red Cross.
translation.es: No soy la maldita Cruz Roja.

translation.en: - Hey. - You can't go in there now, Harry.
What are you two doing here? You need something?
Okay, I have a town meeting in 20 minutes. I'll see you at home after?
translation.es: Tengo una reunión en 20 minutos. ¿Nos vemos en casa después?

translation.en: All we know is, there was a smell, it went away, and now it's back.
translation.es: Solo sabemos que había un olor, se fue y ahora regresó.

translation.en: The committee of selectmen have asked the federal government for help.
translation.es: El comité selecto le pidió ayuda al gobierno federal.

translation.en: The EPA and the Department of the Interior will begin testing this week.
translation.es: La EPA y el Ministerio del Interior comenzarán las pruebas esta semana.

translation.en: The point is, there's no reason to suspect that this stink poses any health hazard.
translation.es: Pero no hay razón para sospechar que este olor sea peligroso para la salud.

translation.en: But if anyone wants to use this as a cue to get out of Dodge for the week,
translation.es: Pero si alguien quiere aprovechar para irse de aquí una semana,

translation.en: And, of course, our senior high school,
translation.es: Y por supuesto, en nuestra secundaria,

translation.en: kids over the age of 16 are going to be the guest of the National Park Service
translation.es: los chicos mayores de 16 serán llevados por el Servicio de Parques Nacionales

translation.en: who will bus them to the Great Smoky Mountains for a week's camping.
translation.es: a acampar una semana en las Montañas Humeantes.

translation.en: All right, last one for a week. We don't wanna start a forest fire.
translation.es: Bien, la última por una semana. No queremos provocar un incendio.

translation.en: - Graffiti. - Yeah, I know it's graffiti, man,
translation.es: Un grafiti. Sí, sé que es un grafiti.

translation.en: but when was the last time you guys saw graffiti in this town?
translation.es: Pero ¿cuándo fue la última vez que vieron un grafiti aquí?

translation.en: It's the writing on the wall.
- Yeah, no duh. - That's what it's called.
The writing on the wall? From the Bible, the Book of Daniel.
translation.es: La escritura en la pared, de la Biblia, el libro de Daniel.

translation.en: - Mene Mene Tekel Upharsin. - Why do you always know shit I don't know?
translation.es: - Mene Mene Tekel Upharsin. - ¿Por qué siempre sabes cosas que yo no?

translation.en: It means, You've been weighed in the balance and found wanting.
translation.es: Significa: Pesado has sido en la balanza y fuiste hallado falto.

translation.en: someone was definitely fucking high last night.
Dad wanted to make sure we brought our toothbrushes, did you...
translation.es: Papá quería saber si trajimos los cepillos de dientes. ¿Tú...?

translation.en: - It's just a shirt. - Half a shirt. And not for school.
translation.es: - Es solo una blusa. - Media blusa. Y no es para la escuela.

translation.en: - You have no idea. - Of course I do. I have a mother.
translation.es: - No tienes idea. - Claro que sí. Tengo madre.

translation.en: - Just-- - Stop, I can do it.
- Um, okay, I'm gonna-- - All right, have fun.
Do you mind if I, uh, sit here?
Rock slides, the road is closed. You're back home.
translation.es: El camino está cerrado por un derrumbe, volvemos a casa.

translation.en: Well, doesn't look like anyone was expecting us.
translation.es: Bueno, parece que nadie nos estaba esperando.

translation.en: My mom's phone, it just keeps ringing.
- You're not going to wait for me? -
Can I crash with you tonight? It's too far back to my place.
translation.es: ¿Puedo quedarme contigo hoy? Mi casa está muy lejos.

translation.en: Mom, I'm back home. They-- They brought us back.
translation.es: Mamá, volví a casa. Nos trajeron de regreso.

translation.en: - My mom must've left town with my sister. - Same here.
translation.es: - Mi mamá debió salir con mi hermana. - Lo mismo aquí.

translation.en: But their cars are still in the driveway. It's fucking weird.
translation.es: Aunque su auto sigue en la entrada, es muy raro.

translation.en: Fuck. I don't think I have any data.
translation.es: Maldición, creo que no tengo datos.

translation.en: And the storm must have knocked out our data.
translation.es: La tormenta debe habernos dejado sin datos.

translation.en: Hey, so who decided that we needed a flash mob?

translation.es: Es mejor que 200 personas enviando mensajes.

translation.en: Has anyone been able to reach anyone?
And there was a miscommunication, and we were brought back here by mistake.
translation.es: Hubo un malentendido y nos trajeron aquí por error.

translation.en: Someone would still answer a phone.
I don't know, maybe there's some place with no reception.
translation.es: No sé, tal vez estén en un lugar sin recepción.

translation.en: In the morning, someone will answer a phone.
Maybe it's not safe for us to be here, if they all left.
translation.es: Quizá no sea seguro estar aquí si se fueron todos.

translation.en: A couple hours isn't gonna make a difference.
translation.es: Un par de horas no cambiará nada.

translation.en: We'll figure this all out in the morning.
Yeah, we should go home. And anyone who doesn't want to...
translation.es: Sí, deberíamos irnos. El que no quiera estar solo puede venir con nosotras, ¿sí?

translation.en: uh, be alone can come back to our house. Yeah?
translation.es: El que no quiera estar solo puede venir con nosotras, ¿sí?

translation.en: Yeah. Yeah, Harry, yeah. Just go to sleep.
No, I don't care what Cassandra says.
translation.es: No, no me importa lo que diga Cassandra.

translation.en: I-- Yeah, no, I get that, Gwen, and maybe your mom and dad would do something like this,
translation.es: Sí, entiendo eso, Gwen, y tal vez tus padres harían algo así,

translation.en: but my mom doesn't leave her house unless you drag her out by her hair and...
translation.es: pero mi mamá no sale de casa a menos que la jales del cabello y...

translation.en: - And even then, she-- - You're being paranoid, Lex.
translation.es: - Y aun así... - Estás siendo paranoica, Lex.

translation.en: Your mom left because of the smell, like Cassandra said.
translation.es: Tu mamá se fue por el olor, como dijo Cassandra.

translation.en: It's the only thing that makes sense.
translation.es: Es lo único que tiene sentido.

translation.en: So, let's just forget about it tonight.
translation.es: Así que olvidémoslo por esta noche.

translation.en: No, no, I'm not gonna go to some party, all right? You go.
translation.es: No, no voy a ir a una fiesta, ¿sí? Ve tú.

translation.en: I got to go take a pee.
The whole place is open, man. Just go right here.
translation.es: Es un lugar abierto, haz ahí.

translation.en: Who's gonna remember in the morning?
Shut the fuck up. Can you fucking leave?
translation.es: Cierra la maldita boca. - ¿Puedes irte? - Es solo una amiga.

translation.en: - She's just my friend. - Um, I would, but--
translation.es: - ¿Puedes irte? - Es solo una amiga. Lo haría, pero...

translation.en: Hey, Kel. I can explain everything. Kel!

translation.es: No puedo hacer señas y filmar.

translation.en: Why don't you ever join in?
Hey, why are you spoiling all the fun?
translation.es: Oye. ¿Por qué arruinas toda la diversión?

translation.en: Is it like a ballerina thing?
- Just go away. - What's your problem?
Apart from the fact that you were drying her tits?
I didn't mean anything by it.
You don't mean anything by anything.
I was just trying to have a little bit of fun.
translation.es: Solo trataba de divertirme un poco.

translation.en: I mean, it's not like we own each other.
No. I mean, you know what I mean.
translation.es: No. Tú sabes a qué me refiero.

translation.en: She doesn't really believe in this kind of thing, you know?
translation.es: ...no cree en este tipo de cosas, ¿sabes?

translation.en: It's always a lot less fun than you think it's gonna be. Isn't it?
translation.es: Siempre es menos divertido de lo planeado, ¿no?

translation.en: I have a confession to make.
Well, this isn't a Catholic Church.  Shit.
translation.es: - Esta no es una iglesia católica. - Mierda.

translation.en: You can't just do that, you know?
Once it was so cold, my pee froze on the way down.
translation.es: Una vez, hacía tanto frío que mi orina se congeló al caer.

translation.en: Oh, I wish I'd been there.
The writing on the wall, it's gone.
translation.es: La escritura en la pared no está.

translation.en: Yeah, of course it is. They cleaned it up.
This is West Ham. If it's ugly, it's gone.
translation.es: Esto es West Ham. Si algo es feo, se va.

translation.en: We're completely cut off from the world.
There's no cable Wi- Fi. Go check your modem.
translation.es: No hay wifi. Revisa tu módem.

translation.en: Try your parents' satellite TV. Nothing.
translation.es: Prueba la televisión satelital de tus padres. Nada.

translation.en: And you really want to freak yourself out?
It's all fucked up. We can talk to each other, but...
translation.es: Es un desastre. Podemos hablar entre nosotros, pero...

translation.en: it's like there's nothing beyond this place.
translation.es: ...es como si no hubiera nada más allá de aquí.

translation.en: I'll get a car and go to Greenwich to get help.
translation.es: Buscaré un auto e iré a Greenwich a buscar ayuda.

translation.en: Someone has to find out where everyone went.
translation.es: Alguien debe averiguar adónde fueron todos.

translation.en: Luke, you want to see if we can get some of the guys to come with?
translation.es: Luke, ¿quieres ver si alguno de los chicos quiere acompañarnos?

translation.en: Okay, so as a rule, the more bizarre a thing seems, the less mysterious it is.
translation.es: Como regla, cuanto más raro parece algo, menos misterioso es.

translation.en: - I don't know this shit. - How about Sherlock Holmes?
translation.es: - Ni puta idea... - Me gusta Sherlock Holmes.

translation.en: The point is, there's an explanation for everything.
translation.es: El punto es que todo tiene una explicación.

translation.en: What does that have to do with the Arthur Conan Boyle dude?
translation.es: ¿Qué tiene que ver eso con Arthur Conan Boyle?
Es Doyle, y no tienes remedio.

translation.en: What the fuck is going on?
I mean, there's only so many options.
Maybe this is just some elaborate fucking game.
translation.es: Tal vez esto sea un maldito juego elaborado.

translation.en: Like, someone built an exact replica of our town
translation.es: Alguien construyó una réplica exacta de nuestro pueblo

translation.en: and just put in the middle of nowhere, and if we just walk...
translation.es: y la puso en medio de la nada. Y si caminamos...

translation.en: like, this way or that way or any way,
translation.es: ...por aquí o por allá, o por cualquier lado,

translation.en: eventually we'll get back to the...
I'm not saying it makes any sense.
and it came back, and the buses came for us.
translation.es: volvió y los autobuses vinieron por nosotros.

translation.en: You're gonna just work this out, Cassandra? Like some logic problem?
translation.es: ¿Vas a resolver esto, Cassandra? ¿Como si fuera un problema lógico?

translation.en: I mean, not a flicker of a doubt?
The world doesn't just turn upside down without a reason.
translation.es: El mundo no se pone de cabeza sin una razón.

translation.en: We're not in some play- within- a- play.
translation.es: No estamos en una obra dentro de otra obra.

translation.en: Okay? Clever is not the same thing as true.
translation.es: Ser inteligente no es lo mismo que saber la verdad.

translation.en: There is a point to everything, there are answers.
translation.es: Hay una razón para todo, hay respuestas.

translation.en: God doesn't just play games with people for fun.
translation.es: Dios no juega con la gente solo por diversión.

translation.en: All right, look, Grizz and I will get a group together
translation.es: Miren, Grizz y yo reuniremos a un grupo

translation.en: and we'll go hike out here through the woods, okay? Like a search party.
translation.es: e iremos a investigar por el bosque, como un grupo de búsqueda.

translation.en: I think that's a good idea.
- Yeah, sure. - Grizz knows what he's doing.
translation.es: - ¿Creen que es seguro? - Sí, claro. Grizz sabe lo que hace y, si hay gente, debemos encontrarlos, ¿no?

translation.en: And if there's people out there, we gotta find 'em, right?
translation.es: Grizz sabe lo que hace y, si hay gente, debemos encontrarlos, ¿no?

translation.en: Yeah, I got a house with a refrigerator with food inside of it, and I'm gonna go eat it.
translation.es: Sí, tengo una casa y un refrigerador con comida adentro, que me voy a comer.

translation.en: Well, what are we supposed to do instead?
We have to figure out what is happening to us.
translation.es: Tenemos que averiguar qué nos está pasando.

translation.en: You're not student council president anymore.
translation.es: Ya no eres presidenta del consejo estudiantil.

translation.en: God, you really, really need to get over that.
Jesus Christ, just get in the car.
- Leave her alone. - Hey, fuck off, Will.
translation.es: - Déjala en paz. - Vete al carajo, Will.

translation.en: - I'm just gonna send a text. -
- Let everybody know how fucked we are. - Campbell!
translation.es: - que diga lo jodidos que estamos. - Campbell.

translation.en: Come on, let's think about this.
Hi, you've reached the office of Amanda Pressman.
translation.es: Hola, se comunicó con la oficina de Amanda Pressman.

translation.en: At the sound of the tone, please--
translation.es: Al oír el tono, por favor...

translation.en: Hi, you've reached Jim Pressman's phone. Sorry I can't answer your--
translation.es: Hola, se comunicó con Jim Pressman. No puedo contestar ahora...

translation.en: You've reached the Pressman residence. Please leave a message after the--
translation.es: Se comunicó con la residencia Pressman. Deje un mensaje después del...

translation.en: I just needed to talk to someone.
You're really not talking to me?
What I did is not the worst crime in the world,
translation.es: Lo que hice no es el peor crimen del mundo.

translation.en: and given everything, can't I get a tiny break?
translation.es: Y dadas las circunstancias, ¿no puedes dejarlo pasar?
Antes de que no quede nada.

translation.en: Are you serious? Can I have a bag? No, you can't.
translation.es: - ¿En serio? ¿Puedes darme un paquete? - No, no puedo.

translation.en: - But there's none left, Elle. - That's not my problem.
translation.es: - Pero no queda nada, Elle. - Ese no es mi problema.

translation.en: You ever see that movie The Poseidon Adventure?
translation.es: ¿Alguna vez viste La aventura del Poseidón?

translation.en: It's about a cruise ship and it capsizes,
translation.es: Se trata de un crucero que se hunde.

translation.en: and the captain, he comes into this big, upside- down ballroom,
translation.es: El capitán llega a un gran salón que está dado vuelta

translation.en: he tells everybody to stay where they are, that they're gonna be rescued.
translation.es: y les dice a todos que se queden donde están porque van a rescatarlos.

translation.en: And-- And six of them, they decide to climb up,
translation.es: Y seis de ellos deciden subir...

translation.en: to the bottom of the ship.
And some of them live, and no one else does.
translation.es: Algunos de ellos sobreviven, y nadie más lo hace.

translation.en: And ever since I watched it, I always wondered...
translation.es: Desde que la vi, siempre me pregunté...

translation.en: You know, like, who am I in this story? Am I the one who has to...
translation.es: ¿Quién soy yo en esa historia? ¿Soy la que tiene que...

translation.en: you know, die so that everyone else lives?
Am I the one who turns out weaker than expected?
translation.es: ¿La que resulta más débil de lo esperado?

translation.en: Am I the one who's only doing the best when the going is good?
translation.es: ¿La que solo hace lo mejor cuando las cosas van bien?

translation.en: I know I'm not the heroine.
translation.es: Sé que no soy la heroína.

translation.en: I'm telling you, the one that you are right now...
translation.es: Te digo que la que eres ahora...

translation.en: you don't want to be that one.
translation.es: ...no es la persona que quieres ser.

translation.en: Do you have, like, a drug problem or something?
translation.es: ¿Tiene un problema con las drogas o algo así?

translation.en: Depends on what you mean by that.
- What? - Uh, your-- Uh, your lips.
Can you take me home? I have to go home.
translation.es: ¿Me llevarías a casa? Debo ir a casa.

translation.en: Cassandra, what's... What's going on right now?
I ditched my check- up for this trip.
translation.es: Falté a mi chequeo por este viaje.

translation.en: I don't know where I put my pills.
translation.es: No sé dónde puse las píldoras.

translation.en: - I'm gonna fucking die. - Come on, don't say that.
translation.es: - Me voy a morir. - Vamos, no digas eso.

translation.en: We'll break into the pharmacy, even if we have to blow it up.
translation.es: Entraremos a la farmacia, aunque sea explotándola.

translation.en: What if things don't go back to the way they were?
translation.es: Pero ¿y si nada vuelve a ser como antes?

translation.en: - 'Course they're gonna go back the way-- - Don't give me a fucking speech, Gordie.
translation.es: - Claro que volverá a ser... - No me des un puto discurso, Gordie.

translation.en: Look, okay, if it turns out we're stuck here,
translation.es: Mira, si resulta que estamos atrapados aquí,
sea lo que sea que eso signifique,

translation.en: If we can't go back home, if this is our new home, then...
translation.es: si no podemos regresar a casa y esta es nuestra nueva casa...

translation.en: then I'll learn how to take care of you.
I can study. There's still a hospital.
translation.es: Puedo estudiar. Aún hay un hospital.

translation.en: You have to stay alive, or else we're all fucked.
translation.es: Tienes que seguir viva o estaremos jodidos.

translation.en: Okay, so five days' worth of food,
translation.es: Bien, tenemos cinco días de comida.

translation.en: and that should be enough to get us past Greenwich, Stamford,
translation.es: Eso debería alcanzarnos para pasar por Greenwich, Stamford,

translation.en: and all the way up to New Haven.
- I don't understand. - It was my mother's.
translation.es: No entiendo. Era de mi madre.

translation.en: - I need to go. - She was fucking someone.
translation.es: - Debo irme. - Está cogiéndose a alguien.

translation.en: My dad hasn't even been dead six months.
translation.es: No hace ni seis meses que murió mi papá.

translation.en: But what does that matter now?
How is finding some shit about our parents going to make things better?
translation.es: ¿De qué nos sirve ahora descubrir secretos de nuestros padres?

translation.en: It was an insurance policy that my father left for me and my sister,
translation.es: Era una póliza de seguro que mi padre nos dejó a mí y a mi hermana

translation.en: in case things go to shit.
translation.es: por si las cosas se ponían feas.
¿A quién le importa el oro, Harry?
No se puede confiar en nadie.

translation.en: All you can do is have an advantage and this is mine,
translation.es: Solo puedes tener una ventaja y esta es la mía, es la única que tengo.

translation.en: this is the only one that I have. Okay?
translation.es: Solo puedes tener una ventaja y esta es la mía, es la única que tengo. ¿Sí?

translation.en: We don't own each other, remember?
Why should I trust you today, when things are shit,
translation.es: ¿Por qué debería confiar en ti hoy, cuando todo está mal,

translation.en: if I couldn't trust you yesterday?
translation.es: si no podía confiar en ti ayer?

translation.en: You have to stick with your own.
It's just a chunk of metal, Harry.
translation.es: Es solo un trozo de metal, Harry.

translation.en: I don't think that's gonna matter now.
translation.es: No creo que eso importe ahora.

translation.en: - Thank you. - Who's got the peanut butter?
translation.es: Gracias. - ¿Y la mantequilla de maní? - No la veo por ningún lado.
- ¿Y la mantequilla de maní? - No la veo por ningún lado.

translation.en: - Is it still in the pack? - I'll get it.
- What the fuck? Fuck! - What just happened?
- Fucking bit me! - Hey, clear the area.
translation.es: - ¿Qué pasó? - ¡Me mordió! Despejen la zona, ¿sí? Debemos acostarla.

translation.en: - Would you lie her down? Careful. - Shit, shit, shit, shit! Ow!
translation.es: Despejen la zona, ¿sí? Debemos acostarla. - ¡Mierda! - Cuidado.

translation.en: - All right, just lie her down. - Yeah.
- Just get back, get back. - Fuck!
Fucking shit, it hurts so much!
Let's try-- Hey, I'm gonna try to calm you down. All right?
You wanna slow your heart rate down. So, deep breaths.
translation.es: Quiero bajar tu ritmo cardíaco. Respira profundo.

translation.en: That's good, okay. So, squeeze my hand.
translation.es: Así está bien. Aprieta mi mano.

translation.en: Big squeeze. Think we can get some packs?
Put it beneath the back of her head, we want her heart above it.
translation.es: Colóquenlas detrás de su espalda, debemos elevar el corazón.

translation.en: Oh, yeah, that's a good-- that's a good bite.
- Okay. - Is it supposed to hurt this much?
Don't worry, Grizz knows what he's doing, all right?
translation.es: No te preocupes. Grizz sabe lo que hace, ¿sí?

translation.en: - Okay, let it out. - It's gonna be a badass scar.
translation.es: - Bien, listo. - Será una cicatriz increíble.

translation.en: Everybody else all right? You guys good?

translation.es: Siento un hormigueo en la boca.
Siento un hormigueo en la boca.

translation.en: If you pick up, I'll explain.
So you're not afraid I'm alive.
translation.es: Para que no te asustes, estoy viva.

translation.en: We just want to be with you at home.
translation.es: Solo quiero estar contigo en casa.

translation.en: You know how you said everyone we go to school with is an asshole?
translation.es: ¿Recuerdas que dijiste que todos los de la escuela son imbéciles?

translation.en: Well, nobody is feeling well, Cassandra.
I'm serious. I can't find my medicine.
translation.es: En serio. No encuentro la medicación.

translation.en: Your medicine's-- Your medicine's in my bag.
translation.es: Tu medicación está en mi bolso.

translation.en: Yeah, I took it for you. I thought maybe you'd forgotten it.
translation.es: La llevé por ti, creí que la habías olvidado.

translation.en: Yeah. Yeah, I'll get it for you.
But then you need to get out there and you need to do something,
translation.es: Pero luego tienes que salir y hacer algo,

translation.en: because there's like a hundred scared- shitless idiots running around.
translation.es: porque hay como cien idiotas corriendo por ahí asustados.

translation.en: - No one wants to hear anything from me. - Fuck that, Cassandra, you're here.
translation.es: Nadie quiere oír nada de mí. Al diablo con eso, estás aquí.

translation.en: - Me, too. - And I have to take care of myself.
translation.es: - Yo también. - Debo cuidarme a mí misma.

translation.en: - You can't do that. - Why not?
translation.es: - No puedes hacer eso. - ¿Por qué no?

translation.en: And I need you take care of me.
translation.es: Necesito que me cuides a mí.

translation.en: I live in your shadow for 17 fucking years...
translation.es: Viví bajo tu sombra durante 17 malditos años,

translation.en: and now you want to disappear?
Just go get my medicine, Allie.
Glasberg tried to barbecue in his own room and...
translation.es: Glasberg intentó hacer una parrillada en su cuarto

translation.en: I'd have voted him most likely to do that.
translation.es: Es algo que definitivamente él haría.

translation.en: I don't know where I'm going.
break into a restaurant and steal some food and hang out.
translation.es: ...entrar a un restaurante, robar comida y pasar el rato.

translation.en: Look, I just want to help.
So what? That's what I want.
Since the day I moved here.
It's not a very good time. In case you haven't noticed,
translation.es: No es un buen momento. Por si no lo notaste,

translation.en: - the whole world just turned upside down. - I noticed, okay? Believe me.
translation.es: - el mundo se puso patas para arriba. - Lo noté, ¿sí? Créeme.

translation.en: Today feels like the first day in my whole life that it's the right time.
translation.es: Siento que hoy es el primer día de mi vida en que es el momento correcto.

translation.en: Now what does he have that I don't have?
translation.es: ¿Qué tiene él que yo no tenga ahora?

translation.en: We're in Connecticut, man. What the fuck? There's no fucking cobras here.
translation.es: Estamos en Connecticut. ¿Qué diablos? Aquí no hay cobras.

translation.en: Listen, if this were yesterday, if we were home...
translation.es: Mira, si hubiera sido ayer, si estuviéramos en casa...

translation.en: But we're three hours from anywhere.
translation.es: Pero estamos a tres horas de cualquier lugar,

translation.en: And I have no idea what to...
translation.es: y no tengo idea de qué hacer.

translation.en: Fuck. What-- What the fuck does that mean?
Her body's shutting down, she's suffocating.
translation.es: Su cuerpo se apaga, se está ahogando.

translation.en: What... I made her do it, dude.
You should tell everybody so they're prepared.
translation.es: Deberías decirles a todos que se preparen.

translation.en: What the fuck does that mean? Are you giving up, Grizz?
Luke, we're so fucking in over our heads here. Jesus fucking Christ, man.
translation.es: - Esto nos supera ampliamente. - Dios mío, carajo.

translation.en: H- hey, I don't think she's breathing.
- I don't think she's-- - Give her mouth- to- mouth, just--
translation.es: - Creo que no... - Hazle respiración boca a boca...

translation.en: - I don't know how to-- Okay! - Just do it, just blow!
translation.es: - No sé cómo... - Solo hazlo. ¡Sopla! Bien.
- Inclina su cabeza. - ¿Qué? - Debes inclinar su cabeza. - Tapa su nariz.

translation.en: - You have to tilt her head back. - Block her nose.
translation.es: - Debes inclinar su cabeza. - Tapa su nariz.

translation.en: - Put your fingers over her nose! - Look, I'm doing the best I can!
translation.es: - ¡Tapa su nariz con los dedos! - Hago lo mejor posible.
- ¿Tiene pulso? - No lo sé, creo que no.

translation.en: - I don't know. I don't think so. - That's not how you do it. Shit.
translation.es: - ¿Tiene pulso? - No lo sé, creo que no. Así no se hace. Mierda.

translation.en: No, you can't do that while I'm doing this! It's not gonna work!
translation.es: ¡No puedes hacer eso mientras hago esto! - ¡No funcionará! - ¡Déjala!

translation.en: - Stop, then! - But you told me--
translation.es: - ¡No funcionará! - ¡Déjala!  - Pero me dijiste... - Y ahora te digo que pares, ¿sí?

translation.en: And now I'm telling you not to, okay?!
translation.es: - Pero me dijiste... - Y ahora te digo que pares, ¿sí?

translation.en: Come on, Emily, stay with us. Come on!
Oh, my God. Oh, my God.
We need to decide whether to bury her here or take her home.
translation.es: Debemos decidir si enterrarla aquí o llevarla a casa.

translation.en: The rest is out of our hands.
No, no, no. Fuck that. No, we can do this. Come on.
translation.es: No, al diablo con eso. Podemos hacerlo, vamos.

translation.en: I want to know why we're here.
translation.es: Quiero saber por qué estamos aquí.

translation.en: And why this place is exactly like home?
translation.es: Y por qué este lugar es exactamente igual a casa.

translation.en: And the lights still go on?
translation.es: Y por qué aún hay luz...

translation.en: And our cell phones still work.
What if there is no why?
I mean, there's a story here.
Apparently they do. You go missing, you go deaf for no reason.
translation.es: Aparentemente sí. Desapareces, te vuelves sordo sin razón...

translation.en: You're looking for answers.There are none.
translation.es: Buscas respuestas, pero no hay ninguna.

translation.en: You know what? Something happened yesterday.
I have to find out why.
- Need me to take her for a while? - No, I'm all right.
translation.es: ¿Necesitas que la lleve? No, estoy bien.

translation.en: the writing on the wall from before we left.
A sign from God? On a church wall?
translation.es: ¿Una señal de Dios en la pared de una iglesia?

translation.en: 'Cause that's exactly how God would do it.
translation.es: Porque así es como Dios lo haría.

translation.en: I just got a bar of reception.
- Shit. - We should be getting close.
Just tell her to spread the word,
translation.es: Solo dile que corra la voz

translation.en: and have everybody meet at the church.
translation.es: para que todos se reúnan en la iglesia.

translation.en: They must be headed back here.
That's why he wanted us together.
Twelve hours. Maybe they found something.
Or maybe they found nothing. Why wouldn't he say if it was good news?
translation.es: O quizá nada. Hubiera dicho algo si fueran buenas noticias.

translation.en: there are some things that we ought to figure out.
translation.es: hay algunas cosas que debemos resolver.

translation.en: Before we rip this place apart and maybe...
translation.es: Antes de que destrocemos este lugar y quizás...

translation.en: you know, start hurting each other.
I don't know what the hell is going on.
Maybe Luke will come back with some good news.
translation.es: Tal vez Luke regrese con buenas noticias.

translation.en: Yeah, why don't we just wait and see, Cassandra?
translation.es: Sí, ¿por qué no esperamos a ver, Cassandra?

translation.en: Because I would rather prepare for the worst before the worst happens.
translation.es: Porque prefiero prepararme para lo peor antes de que pase lo peor.

translation.en: I don't know specifically, but I think it means...
translation.es: No lo sé específicamente, pero creo que significa...

translation.en: we agree not to just take things
Until all the food is gone and...
translation.es: Hasta que se acabe la comida y...

translation.en: Jesus, man, what is your problem?
What are we agreeing to, Cassandra?
Which one of us gets to decide who gets what?
How do you want to decide things?
Every person for themselves? Then we're back to where we started.
translation.es: ¿Sálvese quien pueda? Y volvemos al principio.

translation.en: Maybe you want to flip a coin to see who decides?
translation.es: ¿O lanzamos una moneda para ver quién decide?

translation.en: - I'm-- I'm not gonna do that. - Okay, okay.
There's no civilization here, not until we start one.
translation.es: Aquí no hay civilización, no hasta que empecemos una.

translation.en: So what are we gonna do?
First, I think we have no choice but to share.
translation.es: Primero, creo que no tenemos más remedio que compartir:

translation.en: Really? How much electricity do we have? Until it's all used up and everything goes dark?
translation.es: ¿En serio? ¿Cuánta energía tenemos hasta que se agote y todo se oscurezca?

translation.en: I think 225 people in 200 houses doesn't make sense.
translation.es: Creo que 225 personas en 200 casas no tiene sentido.

translation.en: What is yours? Do you have money?
The things that you need to live:
translation.es: Las cosas que necesitamos para vivir,

translation.en: food, clothes, the stuff in stores,
translation.es: como la comida, la ropa, los artículos de las tiendas,

translation.en: Are we going to fight each other over food?

translation.es: Eso es porque tú no tienes nada.

translation.en: And some of us have things that others want.
translation.es: Y algunos tenemos cosas que otros quieren.

translation.en: Right, Harry. I have no house.
The place that I used to live in is outside of town, it doesn't exist.
translation.es: El lugar donde vivía está fuera de la ciudad. Ya no existe.

translation.en: You want me to just live on the streets?
You can live wherever you want.
I don't have to listen to this. Not anymore.
translation.es: No tengo que escuchar esto. Ya no.

translation.en: Harry, this has nothing to do with you--
translation.es: Harry, no tiene que ver contigo...

translation.en: No one elected you king, cousin.
translation.es: Nadie te eligió como reina, prima.

translation.en: Did anybody vote for her? Did they?
Anybody elect her to speak on your behalf?
translation.es: ¿Alguien la eligió para que hablara en su nombre?

translation.en: I don't want to be king.
That's not what it looks like.
I've thought a lot about dying.
I've almost gotten used to that.
translation.es: Casi me he acostumbrando a eso.

translation.en: But I don't like to be afraid.
translation.es: Pero no me gusta tener miedo.

translation.en: I don't want to shoot you.

translation.es: Quería llamar la atención de todos.

translation.en: We'll be back when Luke gets here.
Until then, if anybody else is tired of listening to her,
translation.es: Hasta entonces, si alguien más está cansado de escucharla,

translation.en: She died from a snake bite.
Her whole body just shut down.
We did everything we could, but we couldn't save her.
translation.es: Hicimos todo lo posible, pero no pudimos salvarla.

translation.en: So we're gonna bury her tomorrow.

translation.es: Antes de que empiece a oler.

translation.en: So, I'm gonna need a couple of guys.
translation.es: Necesitaré a un par de chicos.

translation.en: just woods that go on forever.

translation.es: No vengas a casa esta noche.

translation.en: I never had just one day that was mine, until now.
translation.es: no hubo un solo día en que fuera mía... hasta ahora.

translation.en: All right, give me the key,
Yea, though I walk through the valley of the shadow of death,
translation.es: Aunque vaya por el valle de la sombra de la muerte,

translation.en: I will fear no evil for thou art with me.
translation.es: no temeré mal alguno, porque tú estás conmigo.

translation.en: Thy rod and thy staff, they comfort me. My cup runneth over.
translation.es: Tu vara y tu cayado me darán aliento. Mi copa está rebosando.
